array.string: 1-10 Swing: Swing his hand viciously for 1d4 damage.
11-20 Frenzy: Attacks everyone nearby for 1d4 damage.
1-10 Swing: Swing his sword in an arc hitting everyone in front of him for 1d6 damage.
11-20 Stab: Stab one target for 1d8 damage.
Shield: Reduces physical damage taken by 1.
1-6 Hammer Drive: Hits one target directly in front of him for 1d6 damage. Cannot be dodged.
7-14 Hammer Swing: Swings his hammer in an arc in front of him for 1d6 damage.
15-20 Hammer Smash: A downward smash hitting enemies at a long range in front of him for 2d4 damage.
1-7 Slam: Flies up into the air. Falls onto the enemies near him for 3d4 damage.
7-14 Leaping Hammer Smash: Flutters his wings. Leaps at the furthest enemy from him for 2d4 damage.
15-20 Double Hammer Swing: Cocks hammer back to his side. Swings twice at enemies in front of him for 2d6 damage.
Soft Under Belly: Takes 1 additional physical damage from frontal attacks.
